metadata.name: Nothing lasts forever 2 of 5
metadata.description:
"Nothing lasts forever" is the first NFT work by Kenta Cobayashi.
Under the theme of "fragments of memory," it attempts to explore the existence and value of "memory," "emotion," and "physicality" in the digital space through 3D objects that were created through the fragmentation and reconstruction of Kenta Cobayashi's representative photographic works.

*Animation by Hayate Shibuya (dod.inc) 
*The first showcase of the video work "9 debris" (2022, single and multiple channel video), in which nine 3D digital pieces appear, was Kenta Cobayashi's solo exhibition "Tokyo Débris" (WAITINGROOM, Tokyo, 2022).

《Nothing lasts forever》は、小林健太による初のNFT作品です。
「記憶のカケラ」をテーマに、小林健太がこれまで発表してきた代表的な写真作品を断片化し、再構成した3Dオブジェクトを通じ、デジタル空間において「記憶」「情緒」「身体性」の存在と価値を問うことを試みます。

*Animation by Hayate Shibuya (dod.inc) 
*９点の3Dデータが登場する映像作品《9 debris》(2022年、シングルチャンネル・マルチプルチャンネルビデオ)の初出は、小林健太個展「Tokyo Débris」(WAITINGROOM、東京、2022年)となる。

The copyright belongs to the artist. 
Commercial use is prohibited.
